title: Sex Changes: A Memoir of Marriage, Gender, and Moving On
description: What do you do when the other woman is your husband? A wife's memoir of her husband's sex change.Christine Benvenuto had been married for more thanÂ twenty years with three young children when her husband turned to her one night in bed and said "I'm thinking constantly about my gender." He was unhappy in his body and wanted to become a woman.Part memoir, part voyeur's look into a marriage, Sex Changes is a journey through the end of a marriage and out the other side.
author: Christine Benvenuto
